   38: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   39:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   40:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   41: 	 get_columns_and_rows/1, exit_initial/1, job_control_local/1,
   42: 	 job_control_remote/1,stop_during_init/1,wrap/1,
   43:          shell_history/1, shell_history_resize/1, shell_history_eaccess/1,
   44:          shell_history_repair/1, shell_history_repair_corrupt/1,
   45:          shell_history_corrupt/1,
   46:          shell_history_custom/1, shell_history_custom_errors/1,
   47: 	 job_control_remote_noshell/1,ctrl_keys/1,
   48:          get_columns_and_rows_escript/1,
   49:          shell_navigation/1, shell_multiline_navigation/1, shell_multiline_prompt/1,

   67: -export([test_invalid_keymap/1, test_valid_keymap/1]).
   68: %% Exports for custom shell history module
   69: -export([load/0, add/1]).
   70: %% For custom prompt testing
   71: -export([prompt/1]).
   72: -record(tmux, {peer, node, name, orig_location }).
   73: suite() ->
   74:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   75:      {timetrap,{minutes,3}}].
   76: 
   77: all() ->
   78:     [{group, to_erl},
   79:      {group, tty}].
   80: 
   81: groups() ->
   82:     [{to_erl,[],
   83:       [get_columns_and_rows_escript,get_columns_and_rows,
   84:        exit_initial, job_control_local,
   85:        job_control_remote, job_control_remote_noshell,
   86:        ctrl_keys, stop_during_init, wrap,
   87:        shell_invalid_ansi,
   88:        {group, shell_history},
   89:        {group, remsh}]},
   90:      {shell_history, [],
   91:       [shell_history,
   92:        shell_history_resize,
   93:        shell_history_eaccess,
   94:        shell_history_repair,
   95:        shell_history_repair_corrupt,
   96:        shell_history_corrupt,
   97:        {group, sh_custom}
   98:       ]},
   99:      {sh_custom, [],
  100:       [shell_history_custom,
  101:        shell_history_custom_errors]},
  102:      {remsh, [],
  103:       [remsh_basic,
  104:        remsh_error,
  105:        remsh_longnames,
  106:        remsh_no_epmd,
  107:        remsh_expand_compatibility_25,
  108:        remsh_expand_compatibility_later_version]},
  109:      {tty,[],
  110:       [{group,tty_unicode},
  111:        {group,tty_latin1},
  112:        test_invalid_keymap, test_valid_keymap,
  113:        shell_suspend,
  114:        shell_full_queue,
  115:        external_editor,
  116:        external_editor_visual,
  117:        shell_ignore_pager_commands
  118:       ]},
  119:      {tty_unicode,[parallel],
  120:       [{group,tty_tests},
  121:        shell_invalid_unicode,
  122:        external_editor_unicode
  123:        %% unicode wrapping does not work right yet
  124:        %% shell_unicode_wrap,

  127:        %% shell_update_window_unicode_wrap
  128:       ]},
  129:      {tty_latin1,[],[{group,tty_tests}]},
  130:      {tty_tests, [parallel],
  131:       [shell_navigation, shell_multiline_navigation, shell_multiline_prompt,
  132:        shell_xnfix, shell_delete,
  133:        shell_transpose, shell_search, shell_insert,

  141:     ].
  142: 
  143: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  144:     Term = os:getenv("TERM", "dumb"),
  145:     os:putenv("TERM", "vt100"),
  146:     [{term,Term}|Config].
  147: 
  148: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  149:     Term = proplists:get_value(term,Config),
  150:     os:putenv("TERM",Term),
  151:     ok.
  152: 
  153: init_per_group(to_erl, Config) ->
  154:     case rtnode:get_progs() of
  155:         {error, Error} ->
  156:             {skip, Error};
  157:         _ ->
  158:             DefShell = rtnode:get_default_shell(),
  159:             [{default_shell,DefShell}|Config]
  160:     end;
  161: init_per_group(remsh, Config) ->
  162:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell, Config) of
  163:         old -> {skip, "Not supported in old shell"};
  164:         new -> Config
  165:     end;
  166: init_per_group(shell_history, Config) ->
  167:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell, Config) of
  168:         old -> {skip, "Not supported in old shell"};
  169:         new -> Config
  170:     end;
  171: init_per_group(tty, Config) ->
  172:     case string:split(tmux("-V")," ") of
  173:         ["tmux",[Num,$.|_]] when Num >= $3, Num =< $9 ->
  174:             tmux("kill-session"),
  175:             "" = tmux("-u new-session -x 50 -y 60 -d"),
  176:             ["" = tmux(["set-environment '",Name,"' '",Value,"'"])
  177:              || {Name,Value} <- os:env()],
  178:             Config;
  179:         ["tmux", Vsn] ->
  180:             {skip, "invalid tmux version " ++ Vsn ++ ". Need vsn 3 or later"};
  181:         Error ->
  182:             {skip, "tmux not installed " ++ Error}
  183:     end;
  184: init_per_group(Group, Config) when Group =:= tty_unicode;
  185:                                    Group =:= tty_latin1 ->
  186:     [Lang,_] =
  187:         string:split(
  188:           os:getenv("LC_ALL",
  189:                     os:getenv("LC_CTYPE",
  190:                               os:getenv("LANG","en_US.UTF-8"))),"."),
  191:     case Group of
  192:         tty_unicode ->
  193:             [{encoding, unicode},{env,[{"LC_ALL",Lang++".UTF-8"}]}|Config];
  194:         tty_latin1 ->
  195:             % [{encoding, latin1},{env,[{"LC_ALL",Lang++".ISO-8859-1"}]}|Config],
  196:             {skip, "latin1 tests not implemented yet"}
  197:     end;
  198: init_per_group(sh_custom, Config) ->
  199:     %% Ensure that ERL_AFLAGS will not override the value of the shell_history variable.
  200:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(["-noshell","-kernel","shell_history","not_overridden"]),
  201:     try erpc:call(Node, application, get_env, [kernel, shell_history], rtnode:timeout(normal)) of
  202:         {ok, not_overridden} ->
  203:             Config;
  204:         _ ->
  205:             SkipText = "shell_history variable is overridden (probably by ERL_AFLAGS)",
  206:             {skip, SkipText}
  207:     catch
  208:         C:R:Stk ->
  209:             io:format("~p\n~p\n~p\n", [C,R,Stk]),
  210:             {skip, "Unexpected error"}
  211:     after
  212:         peer:stop(Peer)
  213:     end;
  214: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  215:     Config.
  216: 
  217: end_per_group(tty, _Config) ->
  218:     Windows = string:split(tmux("list-windows"), "\n", all),
  219:     lists:foreach(
  220:       fun(W) ->
  221:               case string:split(W, " ", all) of
  222:                   ["0:" | _] -> ok;
  223:                   [No, _Name | _] ->
  224:                       "" = os:cmd(["tmux select-window -t ", string:split(No,":")]),
  225:                       ct:log("~ts~n~ts",[W, os:cmd(lists:concat(["tmux capture-pane -p -e"]))])
  226:               end
  227:       end, Windows),
  228: %    "" = os:cmd("tmux kill-session")
  229:     ok;
  230: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  231:     Config.
  232: 
  233: init_per_testcase(Func, Config) ->
  234:     Path = [Func,
  235:             [proplists:get_value(name,P) ||
  236:                 P <- [proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties,Config,[])] ++
  237:                     proplists:get_value(tc_group_path,Config,[])]],
  238:     [{tc_path, lists:concat(lists:join("-",lists:flatten(Path)))} | Config].
  239: 
  240: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  241:     GroupProperties = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  242:     case (GroupProperties =/= false) andalso proplists:get_value(parallel, GroupProperties, false) of
  243:         true -> ok;
  244:         false ->
  245:             %% Terminate any connected nodes. They may disturb test cases that follow.
  246:             lists:foreach(fun(Node) ->
  247:                                   catch erpc:call(Node, erlang, halt, [])
  248:                           end, nodes()),
  249:             ok
  250:     end.
  251: 
  252: %%-define(DEBUG,1).
  253: -ifdef(DEBUG).
  254: -define(dbg(Data),ct:pal("~p",[Data])).
  255: -else.
  256: -define(dbg(Data),noop).
  257: -endif.
  258: 
  259: string_to_term(Str) ->
  260:     {ok,Tokens,_EndLine} = erl_scan:string(Str ++ "."),
  261:     {ok,AbsForm} = erl_parse:parse_exprs(Tokens),
  262:     {value,Value,_Bs} = erl_eval:exprs(AbsForm, erl_eval:new_bindings()),
  263:     Value.
  264: 
  265: run_unbuffer_escript(Rows, Columns, EScript, NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut) ->
  266:     DataDir = filename:join(filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)), "interactive_shell_SUITE_data"),
  267:     TmpFile = filename:join(DataDir, "tmp"),
  268:     ok = file:write_file(TmpFile, <<>>),
  269:     CommandModifier =
  270:         case {NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut} of
  271:             {false, false} -> "";
  272:             {true, false} -> io_lib:format(" < ~s", [TmpFile]);
  273:             {false, true} -> io_lib:format(" > ~s ; cat ~s", [TmpFile, TmpFile]);
  274:             {true, true} -> io_lib:format(" > ~s < ~s ; cat ~s", [TmpFile, TmpFile, TmpFile])
  275:         end,
  276:     Command = io_lib:format("unbuffer -p bash -c \"stty rows ~p; stty columns ~p; escript ~s ~s\"",
  277:                             [Rows, Columns, EScript, CommandModifier]),
  278:     %% io:format("Command: ~s ~n", [Command]),
  279:     Out = os:cmd(Command),
  280:     %% io:format("Out: ~p ~n", [Out]),
  281:     string_to_term(Out).
  282: 
  283: get_columns_and_rows_escript(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  284:     ExpectUnbufferInstalled =
  285:         try
  286:             "79" = string:trim(os:cmd("unbuffer -p bash -c \"stty columns 79 ; tput cols\"")),
  287:             true
  288:         catch
  289:             _:_ -> false
  290:         end,
  291:     case ExpectUnbufferInstalled of
  292:         false ->
  293:             {skip,
  294:              "The unbuffer tool (https://core.tcl-lang.org/expect/index) does not seem to be installed.~n"
  295:              "On Ubuntu/Debian: \"sudo apt-get install expect\""};
  296:         true ->
  297:             DataDir = filename:join(filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)), "interactive_shell_SUITE_data"),
  298:             IoColumnsErl = filename:join(DataDir, "io_columns.erl"),
  299:             IoRowsErl = filename:join(DataDir, "io_rows.erl"),
  300:             [
  301:              begin
  302:                  {ok, 42} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoColumnsErl, NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut),
  303:                  {ok, 99} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoRowsErl, NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut)
  304:              end
  305:              ||
  306:                 {NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut} <- [{false, false}, {true, false}, {false, true}]
  307:             ],
  308:             {error,enotsup} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoRowsErl, true, true),
  309:             {error,enotsup} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoColumnsErl, true, true),
  310:             ok
  311:     end.
  312: 
  313: %% Test that the shell can access columns and rows.
  314: get_columns_and_rows(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  315:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell, Config) of
  316: 	old ->
  317:             test_columns_and_rows(old, []);
  318: 	new ->
  319:             test_columns_and_rows(old, ["-oldshell"]),
  320:             test_columns_and_rows(new, [])
  321:     end,
  322:     ok.
  323: 
  324: test_columns_and_rows(old, Args) ->
  325:     rtnode:run(
  326:       [{putline, ""},
  327:        {putline, "2."},
  328:        {expect, "2\r\n"},
  329:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  330:        {expect, "{error,enotsup}\r\n"},
  331:        {putline, "io:rows()."},
  332:        {expect, "{error,enotsup}\r\n"}
  333:       ], [], [], Args),
  334: 
  335:     rtnode:run(
  336:       [{putline, ""},
  337:        {putline, "2."},
  338:        {expect, "2\r\n"},
  339:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  340:        {expect, "{ok,90}\r\n"},
  341:        {putline,"io:rows()."},
  342:        {expect, "{ok,40}\r\n"}],
  343:       [],
  344:       "stty rows 40; stty columns 90; ",
  345:       Args);
  346: test_columns_and_rows(new, _Args) ->
  347:     rtnode:run(
  348:       [{putline, ""},
  349:        {expect, "1> $"},
  350:        {putline, "2."},
  351:        {expect, "\r\n2\r\n"},
  352:        {expect, "> $"},
  353:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  354:        {expect, "{ok,80}\r\n"},
  355:        {expect, "> $"},
  356:        {putline, "io:rows()."},
  357:        {expect, "\r\n{ok,24}\r\n"}
  358:       ]),
  359: 
  360:     rtnode:run(
  361:       [{putline, ""},
  362:        {expect, "1> $"},
  363:        {putline, "2."},
  364:        {expect,  "\r\n2\r\n"},
  365:        {expect, "> $"},
  366:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  367:        {expect, "\r\n{ok,90}\r\n"},
  368:        {expect, "> $"},
  369:        {putline, "io:rows()."},
  370:        {expect, "\r\n{ok,40}\r\n"}],
  371:       [],
  372:       "stty rows 40; stty columns 90; ").
  373: 
  374: shell_navigation(Config) ->
  375: 
  376:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  377: 
  378:     try
  379:         [begin
  380:              send_tty(Term,"{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}"),
  381:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}), %% Check that cursor jump backward
  382:              check_content(Term, "{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}$"),
  383:              timer:sleep(1000), %% Wait for cursor to jump back
  384:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}")}),
  385:              send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  386:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  387:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  388:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}")}),
  389:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  390:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc")}),
  391:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  392:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',")}),
  393:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  394:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,")}),
  395:              send_tty(Term,"C-Right"),
  396:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b'")}),
  397:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  398:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,")}),
  399:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  400:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{")}),
  401:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  402:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  403:              send_tty(Term,"C-E"),
  404:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}")}),
  405:              send_tty(Term,"C-H"),
  406:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc")}),
  407:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  408:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  409:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  410:          end || U <- hard_unicode()],
  411:         ok
  412:     after
  413:         stop_tty(Term)
  414:     end.
  415: shell_multiline_navigation(Config) ->
  416:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  417: 
  418:     try
  419:         [begin
  420:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  421:              send_tty(Term,"{aaa,"),
  422:              check_location(Term, {0,width("{aaa,")}),
  423:              send_tty(Term,"\n'b"++U++"b',"),
  424:              check_location(Term, {0, width("'b"++U++"b',")}),
  425:              send_tty(Term,"\nccc}"),
  426:              check_location(Term, {-2, 0}), %% Check that cursor jump backward (blink)
  427:              timer:sleep(1000), %% Wait for cursor to jump back
  428:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc}")}),
  429:              send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  430:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  431:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  432:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc}")}),
  433:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  434:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc")}),
  435:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  436:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  437:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  438:              check_location(Term, {-1, width("'b"++U++"b',")}),
  439:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  440:              check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  441:              %send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  442:              %check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  443:              %send_tty(Term,"C-Right"),
  444:              %check_location(Term, {-1, 1}),
  445:              send_tty(Term,"C-Right"),
  446:              check_location(Term, {-1, width("'b"++U++"b'")}),
  447:              send_tty(Term,"C-Up"),
  448:              check_location(Term, {-2, width("{aaa,")}),
  449:              send_tty(Term,"C-Down"),
  450:              send_tty(Term,"C-Down"),
  451:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc}")}),
  452:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  453:              send_tty(Term,"C-Up"),
  454:              check_location(Term, {-1, width("'b"++U)}),
  455:              send_tty(Term,"M-<"),
  456:              check_location(Term, {-2, 0}),
  457:              send_tty(Term,"M->"),
  458:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  459:              check_location(Term, {0,width("ccc")}),
  460:              send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  461:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  462:              check_location(Term, {0,0}),
  463:              send_tty(Term,"C-h"), % Backspace
  464:              check_location(Term, {-1,width("ccc}")}),
  465:              send_tty(Term, "C-Up"),
  466:              send_tty(Term, "End"),
  467:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  468:              send_tty(Term,"M-Enter"),
  469:              check_content(Term, ".. ,"),
  470:              check_location(Term, {-1,0}),
  471:              send_tty(Term,"M-c"),
  472:              check_location(Term, {-3,0}),
  473:              send_tty(Term,"{'"++U++"',\n\n\nworks}.\n")
  474:             end || U <- hard_unicode()],
  475:         ok
  476:     after
  477:         stop_tty(Term)
  478:     end.
  479: 
  480: shell_multiline_prompt(Config) ->
  481:     Term1 = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_multiline_prompt","{shell,inverted_space_prompt}"]}|Config]),
  482:     Term2 = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_multiline_prompt","\"...> \""]}|Config]),
  483:     Term3 = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_multiline_prompt","edlin"]}|Config]),
  484:     Term4 = start_tty(Config),
  485:     try
  486:         check_location(Term1, {0, 0}),
  487:         send_tty(Term1,"\na"),
  488:         check_location(Term1, {0, 1}),
  489:         check_content(Term1, "   a"),
  490:         ok
  491:     after
  492:         stop_tty(Term1)
  493:     end,
  494:     try
  495:         check_location(Term2, {0, 0}),
  496:         send_tty(Term2,"\na"),
  497:         check_location(Term2, {0, 1}),
  498:         check_content(Term2, "...> a"),
  499:         ok
  500:     after
  501:         stop_tty(Term2)
  502:     end,
  503:     try
  504:         send_tty(Term3,"\na"),
  505:         check_location(Term3, {0, 1}),
  506:         check_content(Term3, ".. a"),
  507:         ok
  508:     after
  509:         stop_tty(Term3)
  510:     end,
  511:     try
  512:         send_tty(Term4, "shell:multiline_prompt_func(\"-> \").\n"),
  513:         check_content(Term4, "default"),
  514:         send_tty(Term4, "a\nb"),
  515:         check_content(Term4, "-> b"),
  516:         ok
  517:     after
  518:         stop_tty(Term4)
  519:     end.
  520: 
  521: shell_clear(Config) ->
  522: 
  523:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  524:     {Rows, _Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  525: 
  526:     try
  527:         send_tty(Term,"foobar."),
  528:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  529:         check_content(Term, "foobar"),
  530:         check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  531:         send_tty(Term,"bazbat"),
  532:         check_location(Term, {0, 6}),
  533:         send_tty(Term,"C-L"),
  534:         check_location(Term, {-Rows+1, 6}),
  535:         check_content(Term, "bazbat")
  536:     after
  537:         stop_tty(Term)
  538:     end.
  539: 
  540: shell_xnfix(Config) ->
  541: 
  542:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  543: 
  544:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  545:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  546: 
  547:     As = lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1,"a"),
  548: 
  549:     try
  550:         [begin
  551:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  552:              send_tty(Term,As),
  553:              check_content(Term,[As,$$]),
  554:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - 1}),
  555:              send_tty(Term,"a"),
  556:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  557:              send_tty(Term,"aaa"),
  558:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col + 3}),
  559:              [send_tty(Term,"Left") || _ <- lists:seq(1,3 + width(U))],
  560:              send_tty(Term,U),
  561:              %% a{Cols-1}U\naaaaa
  562:              check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1 - width(U),$a),
  563:                                  U,"\n",lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  564:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  565:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  566:              send_tty(Term,U),
  567:              %% a{Cols-1}U\nUaaaaa
  568:              check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1 - width(U),$a),
  569:                                  U,"\n",U,lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  570:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  571:              %% send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  572:              %% send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  573:              %% a{Cols-2}U\nUaaaaa
  574:              %% check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 2 - width(U),$a),
  575:              %%                     U,"\n",U,lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  576:              %% send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  577:              %% check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1 - width(U),$a),
  578:              %%                     U,U,"\n",lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  579:              %% send_tty(Term,"aa"),
  580:              %% check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 2 - width(U),$a),
  581:              %%                     U,"a\n",U,lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  582:              %% check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  583:              send_tty(Term,"C-K"),
  584:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  585:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  586:              check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  587:              send_tty(Term,"C-E"),
  588:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  589:              send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  590:              ok
  591:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  592:     after
  593:         stop_tty(Term)
  594:     end.
  595: 
  596: 
  597: %% Characters that are larger than 2 wide need special handling when they
  598: %% are at the end of the current line.
  599: shell_unicode_wrap(Config) ->
  600: 
  601:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  602: 
  603:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  604:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  605: 
  606:     try
  607:         [begin
  608:              FirstLine = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - width(U)*2 + 1,"a")],
  609:              OtherLineA = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"a")],
  610:              OtherLineB = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"b")],
  611:              OtherLineC = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"c")],
  612:              OtherLineD = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"d")],
  613:              send_tty(Term,FirstLine),
  614:              check_content(Term, [FirstLine,$$]),
  615:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  616: 
  617:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineA),
  618:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineA,$$]),
  619:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  620: 
  621:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineB),
  622:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineB,$$]),
  623:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  624: 
  625:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineC),
  626:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineC,$$]),
  627:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  628: 
  629:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineD),
  630:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineD,$$]),
  631:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  632: 
  633:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  634:              check_location(Term, {-4, 0}), %% Broken
  635:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  636:              check_location(Term, {-4, width(U)}), %% Broken
  637: 
  638:              send_tty(Term,"DC"), %% Broken
  639:              check_content(Term, ["a.*",U,"$"]),
  640:              check_content(Term, ["^b.*",U,"c$"]),
  641:              check_content(Term, ["^c.*",U,"dd$"]),
  642: 
  643:              send_tty(Term,"a"),
  644:              check_content(Term, [FirstLine,$$]),
  645:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineA,$$]),
  646:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineB,$$]),
  647:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineC,$$]),
  648:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineD,$$]),
  649: 
  650:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  651:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  652:     after
  653:         stop_tty(Term)
  654:     end.
  655: 
  656: shell_delete(Config) ->
  657: 
  658:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  659: 
  660:     try
  661: 
  662:         [ begin
  663:               send_tty(Term,"a"),
  664:               check_content(Term, "> a$"),
  665:               check_location(Term, {0, 1}),
  666:               send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  667:               check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  668:               check_content(Term, ">$"),
  669:               send_tty(Term,"a"),
  670:               send_tty(Term,U),
  671:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a, U])}),
  672:               send_tty(Term,"a"),
  673:               send_tty(Term,U),
  674:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a,U,$a,U])}),
  675:               check_content(Term, ["> a",U,$a,U,"$"]),
  676:               send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  677:               send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  678:               send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  679:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a])}),
  680:               check_content(Term, ["> aa",U,"$"]),
  681:               send_tty(Term,U),
  682:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a,U])}),
  683:               send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  684:               send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  685:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a])}),
  686:               check_content(Term, ["> aa",U,"$"]),
  687:               send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  688:               send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  689:               check_content(Term, ["> a$"]),
  690:               send_tty(Term,"C-E"),
  691:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a])}),
  692:               send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  693:               check_location(Term, {0, width([])})
  694:           end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  695:     after
  696:         stop_tty(Term)
  697:     end.
  698: 
  699: %% When deleting characters at the edge of the screen that are "large",
  700: %% we need to take special care.
  701: shell_delete_unicode_wrap(Config) ->
  702: 
  703:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  704: 
  705:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  706:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  707: 
  708:     try
  709:         [begin
  710:              send_tty(Term,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col,"a")),
  711:              check_content(Term,"> a*$"),
  712:              send_tty(Term,[U,U,"aaaaa"]),
  713:              check_content(Term,["\n",U,U,"aaaaa$"]),
  714:              [send_tty(Term,"Left") || _ <- lists:seq(1,5+2)],
  715:              check_location(Term,{0,-Col}),
  716:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  717:              check_content(Term,"> a* \n"),
  718:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 1}),
  719:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  720:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"\n"]),
  721:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 2}),
  722:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  723:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U," \n"]),
  724:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 3}),
  725:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  726:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,U,"\n"]),
  727:              check_content(Term,["\naaaaa$"]),
  728:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 4}),
  729:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  730:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,U,"a\n"]),
  731:              check_content(Term,["\naaaa$"]),
  732:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 5}),
  733:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  734:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  735:     after
  736:         stop_tty(Term)
  737:     end.
  738: 
  739: %% When deleting characters and a "large" characters is changing line we need
  740: %% to take extra care
  741: shell_delete_unicode_not_at_cursor_wrap(Config) ->
  742: 
  743:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  744: 
  745:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  746:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  747: 
  748:     try
  749:         [begin
  750:              send_tty(Term,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col,"a")),
  751:              check_content(Term,"> a*$"),
  752:              send_tty(Term,["a",U,"aaaaa"]),
  753:              check_content(Term,["\na",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  754:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  755:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  756:              check_content(Term,["\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  757:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  758:              check_content(Term,["\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  759:              check_content(Term,["> a* \n"]),
  760:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  761:              check_content(Term,["\naaaaa$"]),
  762:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"\n"]),
  763:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  764:              check_content(Term,["\naaaa$"]),
  765:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"a\n"]),
  766:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  767:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  768:     after
  769:         stop_tty(Term)
  770:     end.
  771: 
  772: %% When deleting characters and a "large" characters is changing line we need
  773: %% to take extra care
  774: shell_update_window_unicode_wrap(Config) ->
  775: 
  776:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  777: 
  778:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  779:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  780: 
  781:     try
  782:         [begin
  783:              send_tty(Term,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - width(U) + 1,"a")),
  784:              check_content(Term,"> a*$"),
  785:              send_tty(Term,[U,"aaaaa"]),
  786:              check_content(Term,["> a* ?\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  787:              tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",Cols+1]),
  788:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"\naaaaa$"]),
  789:              tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",Cols]),
  790:              check_content(Term,["> a* ?\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  791:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  792:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  793:     after
  794:         stop_tty(Term)
  795:     end.
  796: 
  797: shell_transpose(Config) ->
  798: 
  799:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  800: 
  801:     Unicode = [[$a]] ++ hard_unicode(),
  802: 
  803:     try
  804:         [
  805:          begin
  806:              send_tty(Term,"a"),
  807:              [send_tty(Term,[CP]) || CP <- U],
  808:              send_tty(Term,"b"),
  809:              [[send_tty(Term,[CP]) || CP <- U2] || U2 <- Unicode],
  810:              send_tty(Term,"cde"),
  811:              check_content(Term, ["a",U,"b",Unicode,"cde$"]),
  812:              check_location(Term, {0, width(["a",U,"b",Unicode,"cde"])}),
  813:              send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  814:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  815:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  816:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  817:              check_location(Term, {0, 1+width([U])}),
  818:              send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  819:              check_content(Term, ["ab",U,Unicode,"cde$"]),
  820:              send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  821:              check_content(Term, ["ab",hd(Unicode),U,tl(Unicode),"cde$"]),
  822:              [send_tty(Term,"C-T") || _ <- lists:seq(1,length(Unicode)-1)],
  823:              check_content(Term, ["ab",Unicode,U,"cde$"]),
  824:              send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  825:              check_content(Term, ["ab",Unicode,"c",U,"de$"]),
  826:              check_location(Term, {0, width(["ab",Unicode,"c",U])}),
  827:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  828:              check_location(Term, {0, width(["ab",Unicode,"c",U,"de"])}),
  829:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  830:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  831:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  832:              check_content(Term, ["ab",Unicode,"cde$"]),
  833:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  834:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  835:          end || U <- Unicode],
  836:         ok
  837:     after
  838:         stop_tty(Term),
  839:         ok
  840:     end.
  841: 
  842: shell_search(C) ->
  843:     Term = start_tty(C),
  844: 
  845:     try
  846:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  847:         send_tty(Term,"."),
  848:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  849:         send_tty(Term,"'"),
  850:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  851:         send_tty(Term,[16#1f600]),
  852:         send_tty(Term,"'"),
  853:         send_tty(Term,"."),
  854:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  855:         check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  856:         send_tty(Term,"C-r"),
  857:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  858:         send_tty(Term,"C-a"),
  859:         check_location(Term, {-1, width(C, "'a'.")}),
  860:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  861:         send_tty(Term,"C-r"),
  862:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  863:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  864:         check_content(Term, "search: a\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  865:         send_tty(Term,"C-r"),
  866:         check_content(Term, "search: a\\s*\n\\s*a."),
  867:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  868:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  869:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  870:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  871:         send_tty(Term,"M-c"),
  872:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  873:         ok
  874:     after
  875:         stop_tty(Term),
  876:         ok
  877:     end.
  878: 
  879: shell_insert(Config) ->
  880:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  881: 
  882:     try
  883:         send_tty(Term,"abcdefghijklm"),
  884:         check_content(Term, "abcdefghijklm$"),
  885:         check_location(Term, {0, 13}),
  886:         send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  887:         send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  888:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  889:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  890:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  891:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  892:         check_content(Term, "bcdeafghijklm$"),
  893:         send_tty(Term,"End"),
  894:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  895:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  896:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  897:         check_content(Term, "bcdeafghijlm$"),
  898:         ok
  899:     after
  900:         stop_tty(Term)
  901:     end.
  902: 
  903: shell_update_window(Config) ->
  904:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  905: 
  906:     Text = lists:flatten(["abcdefghijklmabcdefghijklm"]),
  907:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  908: 
  909:     try
  910:         send_tty(Term,Text),
  911:         check_content(Term,Text),
  912:         check_location(Term, {0, width(Text)}),
  913:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",width(Text)+Col+1]),
  914:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  915:         check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  916:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  917:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",width(Text)+Col]),
  918:         %% xnfix bug! at least in tmux... seems to work in iTerm as it does not
  919:         %% need xnfix when resizing
  920:         check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  921:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",width(Text) div 2 + Col]),
  922:         check_location(Term, {0, -Col + width(Text) div 2}),
  923:         ok
  924:     after
  925:         stop_tty(Term)
  926:     end.
  927: shell_small_window_multiline_navigation(Config) ->
  928:     Term0 = start_tty(Config),
  929:     tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term0)," -x ",30, " -y ", 6]),
  930:     {Row, Col} = get_location(Term0),
  931:     Term = Term0#tmux{orig_location = {Row, Col}},
  932:     Text = ("xbcdefghijklmabcdefghijklm\n"++
  933:         "abcdefghijkl\n"++
  934:         "abcdefghijklmabcdefghijklm\n"++
  935:         "abcdefghijklmabcdefghijklx"),
  936:     try
  937:         send_tty(Term,Text),
  938:         check_location(Term, {0, -4}),
  939:         send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  940:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  941:         send_tty(Term, "C-Up"),
  942:         check_location(Term, {-2, 0}),
  943:         send_tty(Term, "C-Down"),
  944:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  945:         send_tty(Term, "Left"),
  946:         check_location(Term, {-1, -4}),
  947:         send_tty(Term, "Right"),
  948:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  949:         send_tty(Term, "\e[1;4A"),
  950:         check_location(Term, {-5, 0}),
  951:         check_content(Term,"xbc"),
  952:         send_tty(Term, "\e[1;4B"),
  953:         check_location(Term, {0, -4}),
  954:         check_content(Term,"klx"),
  955:         send_tty(Term, " sets:is_e\t"),
  956:         check_content(Term,"is_element"),
  957:         check_content(Term,"is_empty"),
  958:         check_location(Term, {-3, 6}),
  959:         send_tty(Term, "C-Up"),
  960:         send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  961:         check_location(Term, {-2, 0}),
  962:         send_tty(Term, "sets:is_e\t"),
  963:         check_content(Term,"is_element"),
  964:         check_content(Term,"is_empty"),
  965:         check_location(Term, {-4, 9}),
  966:         send_tty(Term, "M-Enter"),
  967:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  968:         ok
  969:     after
  970:         stop_tty(Term)
  971:     end.
  972: shell_huge_input(Config) ->
  973:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  974: 
  975:     ManyUnicode = lists:duplicate(100,hard_unicode()),
  976: 
  977:     try
  978:         send_tty(Term,ManyUnicode),
  979:         check_content(Term, hard_unicode_match(Config) ++ "$",
  980:                       #{ replace => {"\n",""} }),
  981:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  982:         ok
  983:     after
  984:         stop_tty(Term)
  985:     end.
  986: shell_receive_standard_out(Config) ->
  987:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  988:     try
  989:         send_tty(Term,"my_fun(5) -> ok; my_fun(N) -> receive after 100 -> io:format(\"~p\\n\", [N]), my_fun(N+1) end.\n"),
  990:         send_tty(Term, "spawn(shell_default, my_fun, [0]). ABC\n"),
  991:         timer:sleep(1000),
  992:         check_location(Term, {0, 0}), %% Check that we are at the same location relative to the start.
  993:         check_content(Term, "3\\s+4\\s+.+>\\sABC"),
  994:         ok
  995:     after
  996:         stop_tty(Term)
  997:     end.
  998: %% Test that the shell works when invalid utf-8 (aka latin1) is sent to it
  999: shell_invalid_unicode(Config) ->
 1000:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1001: 
 1002:     InvalidUnicode = <<$,$,$>>, %%  in latin1
 1003: 
 1004:     try
 1005:         send_tty(Term,hard_unicode()),
 1006:         check_content(Term, hard_unicode() ++ "$"),
 1007:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1008:         check_content(Term, "illegal character"),
 1009:         %% Send invalid utf-8
 1010:         send_stdin(Term,InvalidUnicode),
 1011:         %% Check that the utf-8 was echoed
 1012:         check_content(Term, "\\\\345\\\\344\\\\366$"),
 1013:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1014:         %% Check that the terminal entered "latin1" mode
 1015:         send_tty(Term,"."),
 1016:         check_content(Term, "\\Q\\360\\237\\230\\200\\355\\225\\234.\\E$"),
 1017:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1018:         %% Check that we can reset the encoding to unicode
 1019:         send_tty(Term,"io:setopts([{encoding,unicode}])."),
 1020:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1021:         check_content(Term, "\nok\n"),
 1022:         send_tty(Term,""),
 1023:         check_content(Term, "$"),
 1024:         ok
 1025:     after
 1026:         stop_tty(Term),
 1027:         ok
 1028:     end.
 1029: 
 1030: 
 1031: %% Test the we can handle ansi insert, navigation and delete
 1032: %%   We currently can not so skip this test
 1033: shell_support_ansi_input(Config) ->
 1034: 
 1035:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1036: 
 1037:     BoldText = "\e[;1m",
 1038:     ClearText = "\e[0m",
 1039: 
 1040:     try
 1041:         send_stdin(Term,["{",BoldText,"ab",ClearText,"}"]),
 1042:         timer:sleep(1000),
 1043:         try check_location(Term, {0, width("{1mabm}")}) of
 1044:             _ ->
 1045:                 throw({skip, "Do not support ansi input"})
 1046:         catch _:_ ->
 1047:                 ok
 1048:         end,
 1049:         check_location(Term, {0, width("{ab}")}),
 1050:         check_content(fun() -> get_content(Term,"-e") end,
 1051:                       ["{", BoldText, "ab", ClearText, "}"]),
 1052:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
 1053:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
 1054:         check_location(Term, {0, width("{a")}),
 1055:         send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
 1056:         check_location(Term, {0, width("{")}),
 1057:         send_tty(Term,"End"),
 1058:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
 1059:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
 1060:         check_content(Term, ["{", BoldText, "a"]),
 1061:         ok
 1062:     after
 1063:         stop_tty(Term),
 1064:         ok
 1065:     end.
 1066: 
 1067: shell_expand_location_below(Config) ->
 1068: 
 1069:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1070: 
 1071:     {Rows, _} = get_location(Term),
 1072: 
 1073:     NumFunctions = lists:seq(0, Rows*2),
 1074:     FunctionName = "a_long_function_name",
 1075: 
 1076:     Module = lists:flatten(
 1077:                ["-module(long_module).\n",
 1078:                 "-export([",lists:join($,,[io_lib:format("~s~p/0",[FunctionName,I]) || I <- NumFunctions]),"]).\n\n",
 1079:                 [io_lib:format("~s~p() -> ok.\n",[FunctionName,I]) || I <- NumFunctions]]),
 1080: 
 1081:     DoScan = fun F([]) ->
 1082:                      [];
 1083:                  F(Str) ->
 1084:                      {done,{ok,T,_},C} = erl_scan:tokens([],Str,0),
 1085:                      [ T | F(C) ]
 1086:              end,
 1087:     Forms = [ begin {ok,Y} = erl_parse:parse_form(X),Y end || X <- DoScan(Module) ],
 1088:     {ok,_,Bin} = compile:forms(Forms, [debug_info]),
 1089: 
 1090:     try
 1091:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x 80"]),
 1092: 
 1093:         %% First check that basic completion works
 1094:         send_stdin(Term, "escript:"),
 1095:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1096:         %% Cursor at correct place
 1097:         check_location(Term, {-3, width("escript:")}),
 1098:         %% Nothing after the start( completion
 1099:         check_content(Term, "start\\($"),
 1100: 
 1101:         %% Check that completion is cleared when we type
 1102:         send_stdin(Term, "s"),
 1103:         check_location(Term, {-3, width("escript:s")}),
 1104:         check_content(Term, "escript:s$"),
 1105: 
 1106:         %% Check that completion works when in the middle of a term
 1107:         send_tty(Term, "Home"),
 1108:         send_tty(Term, "["),
 1109:         send_tty(Term, "End"),
 1110:         send_tty(Term, ", test_after]"),
 1111:         [send_tty(Term, "Left") || _ <- ", test_after]"],
 1112:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1113:         check_location(Term, {-3, width("[escript:s")}),
 1114:         check_content(Term, "script_name\\([ ]+start\\($"),
 1115:         send_tty(Term, "C-K"),
 1116: 
 1117:         %% Check that completion works when in the middle of a long term
 1118:         send_tty(Term, ", "++ lists:duplicate(80*2, $a)++"]"),
 1119:         [send_tty(Term, "Left") || _ <- ", "++ lists:duplicate(80*2, $a)++"]"],
 1120:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1121:         check_location(Term, {-4, width("[escript:s")}),
 1122:         check_content(Term, "script_name\\([ ]+start\\($"),
 1123:         send_tty(Term, "End"),
 1124:         send_stdin(Term, ".\n"),
 1125: 
 1126:         %% Check that we behave as we should with very long completions
 1127:         rpc(Term, fun() ->
 1128:                           {module, long_module} = code:load_binary(long_module, "long_module.beam", Bin)
 1129:                   end),
 1130:         check_content(Term, "3>"),
 1131:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -y 50"]),
 1132:         timer:sleep(1000), %% Sleep to make sure window has resized
 1133:         Result = 61,
 1134:         Rows1 = 48,
 1135:         send_stdin(Term, "long_module:" ++ FunctionName),
 1136:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1137:         check_content(Term, "3> long_module:" ++ FunctionName ++ "\nfunctions(\n|.)*a_long_function_name0\\("),
 1138: 
 1139:         %% Check that correct text is printed below expansion
 1140:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1141:                                           [1, 7, Result])),
 1142:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1143:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1144:             [1, Rows1, Result])),
 1145:         send_tty(Term, "Down"),
 1146:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1147:                                           [2, Rows1+1, Result])),
 1148:         send_tty(Term, "PgDn"),
 1149:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1150:                                           [7, Rows1+6, Result])),
 1151:         send_tty(Term, "PgUp"),
 1152:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1153:                                           [2, Rows1+1, Result])),
 1154:         send_tty(Term, "PgUp"),
 1155:         %% Overshoot up
 1156:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1157:                                           [1, Rows1, Result])),
 1158:         %% Overshoot down
 1159:         send_tty(Term, "PgDn"),
 1160:         send_tty(Term, "PgDn"),
 1161:         send_tty(Term, "PgDn"),
 1162:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1163:                                           [14, Rows1+13, Result])),
 1164:         check_content(Term, "\n.*a_long_function_name99\\("),
 1165:         send_tty(Term, "Up"),
 1166:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1167:                                           [13, Rows1+12, Result])),
 1168: 
 1169:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1170: 
 1171:         %% We resize the terminal to make everything fit and test that
 1172:         %% expand below displays everything
 1173:         tmux(["resize-window -t ", tty_name(Term), " -y ", integer_to_list(Rows+10)]),
 1174:         timer:sleep(1000), %% Sleep to make sure window has resized
 1175:         send_stdin(Term, "\t\t"),
 1176:         check_content(Term, "3> long_module:" ++ FunctionName ++ "\nfunctions(\n|.)*a_long_function_name99\\($"),
 1177:         ok
 1178:     after
 1179:         stop_tty(Term),
 1180:         ok
 1181:     end.
 1182: 
 1183: shell_expand_location_above(Config) ->
 1184: 
 1185:     Term = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_expand_location","above"]}|Config]),
 1186: 
 1187:     try
 1188:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x 80"]),
 1189:         send_stdin(Term, "escript:"),
 1190:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1191:         check_location(Term, {0, width("escript:")}),
 1192:         check_content(Term, "start\\(\n"),
 1193:         check_content(Term, "escript:$"),
 1194:         send_stdin(Term, "s"),
 1195:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1196:         check_location(Term, {0, width("escript:s")}),
 1197:         check_content(Term, "\nscript_name\\([ ]+start\\(\n"),
 1198:         check_content(Term, "escript:s$"),
 1199:         ok
 1200:     after
 1201:         stop_tty(Term),
 1202:         ok
 1203:     end.

 1205: shell_help(Config) ->
 1206:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1207:     try
 1208:         send_stdin(Term, "lists"),
 1209:         send_stdin(Term, "\^[h"),
 1210:         check_content(Term, "List processing functions."),
 1211:         send_stdin(Term, ":all"),
 1212:         send_stdin(Term, "\^[h"),
 1213:         check_content(Term, "-spec all(Pred, List) -> boolean()"),
 1214:         ok
 1215:     after
 1216:         stop_tty(Term),
 1217:         ok
 1218:     end.
 1219: %% Test the we can handle invalid ansi escape chars.
 1220: %%   tmux cannot handle this... so we test this using to_erl
 1221: shell_invalid_ansi(_Config) ->
 1222: 
 1223:     InvalidAnsiPrompt =
 1224:         case proplists:get_value(encoding, io:getopts(user)) of
 1225:             unicode ->
 1226:                 ["\e]94m",54620,44397,50612,47,51312,49440,47568,"\e]0m"];
 1227:             latin1 ->
 1228:                 ["\e]94minvalid_test\e]0m"]
 1229:         end,
 1230: 
 1231:     rtnode:run(
 1232:       [{eval, fun() -> application:set_env(
 1233:                          stdlib, shell_prompt_func_test,
 1234:                          fun() -> InvalidAnsiPrompt end)
 1235:               end },
 1236:        {putline,"a."},
 1237:        {expect, "a[.]"},
 1238:        {expect, ["\\Q",InvalidAnsiPrompt,"\\E"]}],
 1239:       "", "",
 1240:       ["-pz",filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1241:        "-connect_all","false",
 1242:        "-kernel","logger_level","all",
 1243:        "-kernel","shell_history","disabled",
 1244:        "-kernel","prevent_overlapping_partitions","false",
 1245:        "-eval","shell:prompt_func({interactive_shell_SUITE,prompt})."
 1246:       ]).
 1247: 
 1248: shell_ignore_pager_commands(Config) ->
 1249:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1250:     case code:get_doc(file, #{sources=>[eep48]}) of
 1251:         {error, _} -> {skip, "No documentation available"};
 1252:         _ ->
 1253:             try
 1254:                 send_tty(Term, "h(file).\n"),
 1255:                 check_content(Term,"\\Qmore (y/n)? (y)\\E"),
 1256:                 send_tty(Term, "n\n"),
 1257:                 check_content(Term,"ok"),
 1258:                 send_tty(Term, "C-P"),
 1259:                 check_content(Term,"\\Qh(file).\\E"),
 1260:                 ok
 1261:             after
 1262:                 stop_tty(Term),
 1263:                 ok
 1264:             end
 1265:     end.
 1266: test_valid_keymap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1267:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
 1268:     Term = setup_tty([{args, ["-config", DataDir ++ "valid_keymap.config"]} | Config]),
 1269:     Prompt = fun() -> ["\e[94m",54620,44397,50612,47,51312,49440,47568,"\e[0m"] end,
 1270:     erpc:call(Term#tmux.node, application, set_env,
 1271:               [stdlib, shell_prompt_func_test,
 1272:                proplists:get_value(shell_prompt_func_test, Config, Prompt)]),
 1273:     try
 1274:         check_not_in_content(Term, "Invalid key"),
 1275:         check_not_in_content(Term, "Invalid function"),
 1276:         send_tty(Term, "asdf"),
 1277:         send_tty(Term, "C-u"),
 1278:         check_content(Term, ">$"),
 1279:         send_tty(Term, "1.\n"),
 1280:         send_tty(Term, "C-b"),
 1281:         check_content(Term, "2>\\s1.$"),
 1282:         ok
 1283:     after
 1284:         stop_tty(Term),
 1285:         ok
 1286:     end.
